title: Disaster for Brooklyn! KD and Kyrie swept out of the playoffs
description:
It’s a sweep! Nets knocked out of the playoffs by the Celtics without winning one game. Jalen & Jacoby discuss the failures of the Nets season. Where do the Nets go from here and what changes are on the horizon? Luka puts on a show in the game 5 blowout of the Utah Jazz. The guys tell you what will happen to the Jazz if they fail to win this series. 76ers lose another game to the Raptors. Will Doc Rivers’ history come back to haunt him? And, Ja Morant tries to give his Most Improved Player Award away. Find out if that’s a Soft Move or Boss Move by Ja. All that and more!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
